page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content:
{THE MEMORIAL PLAYING FIELDS
Outdoor activities and field sports can be held on these playing fields which are on Silverdale Road. There are special facilities for the Bowling Club, for Football and for Cricket and there is an area set aside as a young children's play area with slides, swings and a sea-saw, etc. The remaining areas of the field are open to the public at all times.
The field is also used by the school for its outdoor activities and Sports Days and special events are held there.
